about_the_game:
Music pulses through Planet Rhapsody, resonating from the blue-grass meadows to the craggy mountains. It sustains the mysterious AlgoRhythm, which now faces threats from creatures driven by a supernatural force. As a failed alien pop group, you might not have hit the big time, but you've got the grit and rhythm to save your world.

BUILT BY MUSIC

This demo version includes a tutorial and two levels—hip-hop and drum 'n' bass—each enhancing your experience with a dynamic soundtrack that evolves with every tower you place. Feel the landscape change as you orchestrate your defense with strategic tower placement.

A PERFECT HARMONY OF RHYTHM AND TOWER DEFENSE

Utilize strategy to position and upgrade your Rhythm Towers effectively. As the music's intensity grows, so does the power of your towers. Unlock new towers as you traverse the alien landscape, responding to your rhythmic influence.

UP THE TEMPO WITH INSANE ENEMIES

Prepare for waves of rhythm-hating creeps, each with unique patterns and weaknesses. The demo challenges you with bosses that test your strategy and rhythm skills to the extreme. Adapt and evolve your tactics to overcome these new threats.

Your planet breathes music. Feel it, build it, groove with it in this demo version, featuring single-player mode as Riff. Co-op demo coming soon!

name: Rhythm Towers Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 7th Gen / Ryzen 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080 / AMD Radeon RX 570 8 GB
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 10th Gen / Ryzen 5600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 3060 with 12 GB / AMD Radeon 6700 XT, 12 GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Feel the beat, defend the rhythm in this demo version! On Planet Rhapsody, strategically use musical towers to orchestrate defense against invading creeps. Dive into a harmonious blend of rhythm and strategy, and experience the unique mechanics of Rhythm Towers!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
